title: Starting Line Up on Waivers with Triple Play Discount - 5 Remain
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Starting Line Up on Waivers with Triple Play Discount - 5 Remain
posts.post_content:
Yes, I'm in the mood for cash (yours), so I'm putting the following starting lineup on waivers.  Claiming prices include bus fare to your city, but do not include paypal fees and the like.  All cards are dressed in SGC holders ranging from 60 to Authentic.  

Batting first - Bugs Raymond, Piedmont 350, SGC 60 - $75.00

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/25413/raymond[/IMG]

Batting second - Bob Ewing, SC 150 Fact 649, SGC 50 - $OLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10245/ewing[/IMG]

Batting third - George Stovall, Piedmont 350-460, SGC 50 - $52.00

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10319/stovall-batting[/IMG]

Batting fourth - Harry Krause, Piedmont 350, SGC 45 - $OLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10265/krause-pitching[/IMG]

Batting fifth - Al Orth SL, Piedmont 350, SGC 40 - $OLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/23473/orth-sl[/IMG]

Batting sixth - John McGraw Glove at Hip, Sovereign 460, SGC 30, $95.00

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/16283/mcgraw-glove-at-hip-sov[/IMG]

Batting seventh - Al Burch Batting, Piedmont 150 SGC 30, $30.00

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10034/burch-batting[/IMG]

Batting eighth - Bob Bescher Portrait, Piedmont 350, SGC 20, $25.00

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10038/bescher-portrait[/IMG]

Batting ninth - Willie Keeler Batting, Piedmont 150, SGC A, $OLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10260/keeler-batting[/IMG]

Here's the new deal. 

I did not pay more for any these nine cards than I am asking.  

To get this thread moving, if you are interested in any three of the nine cards,  send me a PM with the three names via PM.  I will then give you a price for the three cards equal to what I paid for them plus $5 to cover the shipping.  At that point you have no obligation to buy them, but I will also not entertain counter offers.  Just give me a yes or no on the price.  

If I receive a second inquiry including a card with a pending offer, you will have to wait until the first triple play is turned down, before I will send you the price for your triple play.

If an inquiry is received containing three cards not in play, I will give you a price immediately (I do sleep on occasion though).

On thread I will update the first post to indicate if an offer is pending and when a sale has been completed.

So in summary,

You must buy three cards.

I, the seller, will make the low-ball offer to you the buyer.

You give me a yeah or nay, with no obligation to buy whatsoever.

Try out the system even if you don't want the cards.

That's it.
